net.dzzd.access
Interface IScene2DObject

All Superinterfaces:
IMonitoredSceneObject, IProgressListener, ISceneObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
ICamera3D, ILight3D, IMesh3D, IScene3DObject, IShape2D, ISolidSphere3D
public interface IScene2DObject
extends ISceneObject

Used for accessing a scene Scene2DObject.
Scene 2d objects include all object that can be added and managed by a Scene2D : Texture,Material,etc...

Version:
1.0, 01/01/04
Author:
Bruno Augier
See Also:
IScene3D, IScene3DObject
